item.description:
UPATE: Event and Game Times have been changed. Please update your RSVP if this changes your plans. For those who have asked and are attending from Boston (Take the 2:45pm North Station Haverhill Commuter Rail Train to Wakefield Station arriving at 3:08pm Depart on 8:03pm Train to Boston).

Treat this as a Pre-New Years Party! Please join us for the LAST 2012 Red Sox Natives Exclusive Event as this will be our last regular season game watching of 2012.

Laurie's 909 Steakhouse and Raw Bar is opening early for the Red Sox Natives and guests as we will be able to take over both bar areas. This will be our only Game Viewing Party of the day. For information on the venue go to http://www.lauries909.com.

Please join the Red Sox Natives, Boston Happy Hour, Wakefield Weeknights and many other invited groups for our 2012 Year End and Patriots Game Viewing Party to watch the New England Patriots take on the Miami Dolphins, at Laurie's 909 Steakhouse and Raw Bar in Wakefield on Sunday, December 30. The Pats may be playing for the #1 or 2 record and a playoff week bye.

Arrive early after 3:30pm to get yourself a prime seat and enjoy some pre-game socializing. Bar and table seating will be available.

GAME TIME HAS BEEN CHANGED TO 4:25pm.

There is no event fee.

Get there when you can and stay as long as you're able. You're more than welcome to show up for all or part of the event. You are not required to be a football fan to attend. Have a drink or two or three, stay for lunch/dinner, watch the game or socialize with other guests. Invite friends, other fans, others who are not away skiing and co-workers.

Please RSVP if you wish to attend as this event will be capped due to space limitations. Participating Groups are:

1. Red Sox Natives (Frank and Jon)

2. Boston Happy Hour (Tonya)

3. Wakefield Weeknights (Melody)

4. North Shore Womens Group (Maria)

5. North Shore Separated & Divorced Group (Maria) 

6. Girlfriends of The North Shore (Sharon)

7. Social Fun (Biaggio)

8. Fun With Alcohol

9. American Singles Golf (Nancy)

 

We may add a raffle for this event. Does anyone have something to donate? 

If this will be your first time meeting the Red Sox Natives and Happy Hour Crew, check out the photos of those who RSVP Yes so you can find the group. If you do not have a recognizable real face photograph as your primary photo do not RSVP for the event. 

Please remember to maintain your own tab or pay as you order and tip your servers. However, if you sit at a group table a group bill may be provided so please communicate with your server when ordering.

Laurie's 909 Steakhouse and Raw Bar is Wakefield's newest Restaurant and Bar with live entertainment several nights per week and Tuesday Night Trivia with Morgan White Jr. from WBZ Radio. Laurie's is located at the Wakefield Commuter Rail Train Station in Wakefield. The Reading and Haverhill Commuter Rail trains stop at Laurie's 909. Laurie's is easily accessible within 10 minutes from Routes 128, 93, 28 and 1. Free parking is available in two lots on Tuttle Street and on street. Check out the MBTA or Hop Stop for additional public transit options including the less reliable/infrequent 136 and 137 bus lines.

Say hello to Laurie and Bob when you visit.

Check out the "Penny Lane" Bar, the 9:09 and Beatles references.

More information at http://www.lauries909.com.

The Red Sox Natives have organized weekly Patriots Viewing parties over the last two seasons with guests from other invited groups attending. We have had a blast with up to 80 people attending at various Boston, Woburn, and Wakefield locations. 

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We have most of the restaurant so ask for the Red Sox Natives and groups near the bar.
item.name: TIME CHANGEYear End & Patriots Viewing Party at Laurie's 909 Steakhouse/Raw Bar
